body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Belgium_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Belgium.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Belgium.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 450 × 390 pixels, file size: 368 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid

div.a: Súčasná štátna a vojnová vlajka Belgicka

div.p: This is the national flag of Belgium, according to the Official Guide to Belgian Protocol. It has a 13:15 aspect ratio, though it is rarely seen in this ratio.
Its colours are defined as Pantone black, Pantone yellow 115, and Pantone red 02; also given as CMYK 0,0,0,100; 0,8.5,79,0; and 0,94,87,0.

p.cite: Van den Bussche, E., Chief of Protocol, Belgian Federal Department of the Interior (2008). Noble Belgique, ô Mère chérie - LE PROTOCOLE EN BELGIQUE (PROTOCOL IN BELGIUM)'. Heule: Editions UGA.

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:00, 8 August 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 06:41, 9 March 2010

td.span: (Going with Pantone, can't split CMYK in Inkscape. Also, the BE government made an error. There is no such thing as Pantone 02, but ther is such thing as Pantone 032 and is used in the flags of Austria and Singapore.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 15:59, 2 November 2009

td.span: (My mistake earlier. This is the official version with the official colours, per the official guide to protocol in Belgium.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:01, 25 October 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 08:37, 7 October 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 14:27, 2 October 2009

td.span: (Official version per Belgian Federal Government. Do not revert without a source.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:53, 1 June 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 14:54, 13 February 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 14:54, 13 February 2008

Thumbnail for version as of 13:45, 19 July 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 19:59, 24 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 10:21, 23 October 2006
